title: My Ward Skin from Hextech chests does not appear in Draft Pick selection
body:
Hello all, I recently have purchased a ward skin permanent from the hextech crafting(not sure what it's called, the name of it was glitched, but it was the Japanese Lantern one), but it does not appear in my champion select. It shows all my other wards, but not this one. Any help would be appreciated! Thanks!

-Fire

replies.body: There is an issue right now where some ward skins are not selectable, even though it's unlocked on the account.  There's no eta for a fix just yet, but I looked into this for you and confirmed that your Lantern of the Serpent Ward is on your account.  Hope that helps!

UPDATE: I can now see my Lantern of the Serpent Ward on my purchase history from the Hextech Chests, however, I am still unable to equip it in a champion select. A fix would be appreciated! Thank you!

Yeah I had the same problem, just rerolled 3 ward skin shards and got the Lantern of the Serpent ward skin and it showed up with a glitched name and I can't select it in champ select or see it in the shop.
